Title: DNN News Ticker
Description: This DNN platform module is a wrapper around the popular, open-source jQuery News Ticker plugin (aka BBC-style news ticker) written by Rhodri George.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This DNN platform module is a wrapper around the popular, open-source jQuery News Ticker plugin (aka BBC-style news ticker) written by Rhodri George.

This module for DNN Platform v 7.3.1 and later is a wrapper around the popular jQuery News Ticker plugin (aka BBC-style news ticker) written by Rhodri George and released under GPLv2 as an open-source project (https://github.com/rhodimus/jQuery-News-Ticker). Both reveal and fade-in/fade-out effects are provided.

The module exposes all settings for the News Ticker script and creates and manages multiple news items which may be custom or creation date sequenced and displayed indefinitely or for a period of time defined by a start and end date.

All management controls (datetime picker, spinner, etc.) are open-source jQuery plugins or jQueryUI widgets rather than Telerik. Custom sequencing of news items is setup via drag-and-drop of grid rows or clicking of up/down arrows without post-back.
